DiscountId.description: The 'natural' sales order number, that this discount line is linked and applied to

DiscountNumber.description: The 'natural' sales order number, that this discount line is linked and applied to

DiscountCode.description: The unique code of the Discount / Promo / Coupon e.g AD020

AllowedApplyLevel.description: The level that the Discount can be applied

DiscountType.description: The specific type of the discount e.g BuyOneGetOneFree, BuyOneGetOneFree

DiscountPurpose.description: The purpose of the Discount e.g Promotion, Campaign, Goodwill etc

DiscountName.description: The name of the discount applied in this discount line

DiscountDesc.description: The name of the discount applied in this discount line

DiscountPercentage.description: The percenatge discounted, if applicable e.g 10 or 10.00 for 10%

GLCode.description: A GL code associated with this Discount

IsManualAllowed.description: Is this allowed to be used manually? e.g Y

ReasonCode.description: The reason code for the creation of this Discount e.g promoX, campaignY

ReasonDesc.description: The reason description for the creation of this Discount

EventId.description: The Xfuze EventId that was the source of this discount

AsOf.description: The timestamp at which the Discount was valid 'as of', if known and applicable
